#include <iostream>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ll t,n,i;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		ll wins[n],temp,max;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>wins[i];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
			wins[i]=wins[i]*3;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>temp;
			wins[i]=wins[i]+temp;
		}
		max=wins[0];
		for(i=1;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(max<wins[i])
				max=wins[i];
		}
		cout<<max<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
